<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/hierarchies/{slug}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a hierarchy by slug

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"slug","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Slug of the hierarchy","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Hierarchy","content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"example":{"value":{"data":{"hierarchy_branches":[{"_link":{"self":"/api/v1/hierarchies/arbre-1/branches/id_region"},"slug":"id_region","title":"id_region"},{"_link":{"self":"/api/v1/hierarchies/arbre-1/branches/id_agence"},"slug":"id_agence","title":"id_agence"}],"root_hierarchy_title":"Enseigne","slug":"arbre-1"}}}}}}},"404":{"description":"Not found","content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"example":{"value":{"status":404,"message":"Not found"}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
